mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article(title, summary, content, cover_url, views, likes, comments, publish_time, update_time, category_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{summary} ,#{content}, #{coverUrl}, #{views}, #{likes}, #{comments}, #{publishTime}, #{updateTime}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, summary, content, cover_url AS coverUrl, views, likes, comments, publish_time AS publishTime, update_time AS updateTime, deleted, category_id AS categoryId FROM article WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0

select id, title, summary, content, cover_url AS coverUrl, views, likes, comments, publish_time AS publishTime, update_time AS updateTime, deleted, category_id AS categoryId FROM article WHERE deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content}, cover_url = #{coverUrl}, views = #{views}, likes = #{likes}, comments = #{comments}, publish_time = #{publishTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, category_id = #{categoryId} WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE article SET deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE article SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE article SET comments = comments + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE article SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article WHERE deleted = 0

SELECT c.id AS categoryId, c.name AS categoryName, c.slug AS categorySlug, COUNT(a.id) AS articleCount FROM category c LEFT JOIN article a ON c.id = a.category_id AND a.deleted = 0 GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug HAVING articleCount > 0 ORDER BY articleCount DESC, c.name ASC

SELECT t.id AS tagId, t.name AS tagName, t.slug AS tagSlug, t.description AS tagDescription, t.color AS tagColor, COUNT(a.id) AS articleCount FROM tag t LEFT JOIN article_tag at ON t.id = at.tag_id LEFT JOIN article a ON at.article_id = a.id AND a.deleted = 0 GROUP BY t.id, t.name, t.slug, t.description, t.color HAVING articleCount > 0 ORDER BY articleCount DESC, t.name ASC

SELECT id, title, summary, content, cover_url AS coverUrl, category_id AS categoryId, publish_time AS publishTime, update_time AS updateTime, views, likes, comments, deleted FROM article WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY publish_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.summary, a.content, a.cover_url AS coverUrl, a.category_id AS categoryId, a.publish_time AS publishTime, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.views, a.likes, a.comments, a.deleted FROM article a INNER JOIN article_tag at ON a.id = at.article_id WHERE at.tag_id = #{tagId} AND a.deleted = 0 ORDER BY a.publish_time DESC
